participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ethan is resilient and determined, always striving to find new opportunities despite facing personal challenges.
participant_1.background: i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young. my father is in the army.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is vibrant and creative, with a passion for animals and a strong sense of individuality.
participant_2.background: my bedroom is purple and lime green. i am a vegan. i like riding horses. i'll graduate from high school in two years. i have brown curly hair.
